amendment.description: To improve air service for families and pregnant women.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3524 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3524 proposed by Senator Nelson for Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1785; text: CR S1785) To improve air service for families and pregnant women.
